claim: A majority of cards—over 50%—do not have a text box in the normal layout.
extra_info: do not have a text box refers to isTextless = 1; proportion refers to DIVIDE(COUNT(Textless = 1 and layout = 'normal'),COUNT(Textless))*100
reasoning: All 115 textless cards (isTextless = 1) have a 'normal' layout, giving a proportion of 100% (115/115 * 100). This is indeed over 50%, confirming the claim that a majority of textless cards are in the normal layout.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN isTextless = 1 AND layout = 'normal' THEN 1 END) as textless_normal, COUNT(CASE WHEN isTextless = 1 THEN 1 END) as total_textless, CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN isTextless = 1 AND layout = 'normal' THEN 1 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(CASE WHEN isTextless = 1 THEN 1 END) * 100 as percentage FROM cards;"
input.description: Calculate percentage of textless cards with normal layout

This could mean: Of the cards in the normal layout, over 50% do not have a text box. OR it could mean: A majority of cards (over 50%) are textless AND in the normal layout.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT layout, COUNT(*) FROM cards WHERE isTextless = 1 GROUP BY layout;"
input.description: Check layout distribution of textless cards

content.text:
All 115 textless cards have a `normal` layout. Using the hint's formula:

- COUNT(isTextless = 1 AND layout = 'normal') = 115
- COUNT(isTextless = 1) = 115
- Proportion = (115 / 115) * 100 = **100%**

The claim states that "a majority—over 50%—do not have a text box in the normal layout," meaning among textless cards, over 50% are in the normal layout. The actual percentage is 100%, which is indeed over 50%. The claim is supported.
